title: Custom Node
content: Sets the default slot of the subcomponent BreadcrumbItem and customizes the node content. to sets the object of route redirection. After replace is set, no new record is added to history.

title: Custom separator
content: Set the separator or separator-icon attribute to customize the separator.

title: options configuration
content:
Totally configure each BreadcrumbItem via options.

Set text-field to specify the field to be displayed. The default field to be displayed is label
